name: Block World Craft Survival
description:
"Big update version, try it for free! amazing good sandbox building game"

Hundreds of amazing maps are added to the game, you can't miss them!
Lots of amazing maps
01-AdventureMap-Maze
A confusing maze which is made of glass. Get all the 10 copper coins and the gold coin to win. Do not use fly/fast mode. Do not break any blocks.
09-AdventureMap-Maze
You mission is find the way to the center of the maze. The goal in the middle has 4 entrances but the outside of the maze only has 2 entrances. Do not use fly/fast mode. Do not break any blocks.
...

Note
1. Login every day to get daily free gold
2. Check game help in the pause menu
3. Support multiplayer
